Craft an item of type: crimson_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 22}, {"type": "tropical_fish", "quantity": 42, "index": 28}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 13, "index": 36}, {"type": "pink_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 4, "index": 38}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 47, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft crimson stairs I need to place 3 crimson planks in a row in the crafting grid. Therefore I will first move one plank from slot 22 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1
